DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this post-marketing surveillance study is to collect and assess information on safety and efficacy of fondaparinux injection in patients with venous thromboembolism (VTE). ("Arixtra" is a trademark of the GlaxoSmithKline group of companies.)
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for ArixtraÂ® (Fondaparinux) Venous Thromboembolism Treatment
DOC.criteria: Patients with acute pulmonary thromboembolism or acute deep venous thrombosis Fondaparinux injection must be prescribed for the first time
